img.alt: TPS kids on the magic carpet

div.a: RECORD-BREAKING 2019 GRADUATION RATE FOR HARALSON COUNTY HIGH SCHOOL!!

span.br:
299 Robertson Avenue Tallapoosa, GA 30176
Phone: 770-574-2500 | Fax: 770-574-2225

br.span: © 2020. Haralson County School District. All Rights Reserved.

div.span: Welcome to the Haralson County Charter School District. It is with great pleasure that I write to you as
your superintendent. Over the last few years, we have seen continual growth with the district and more change is coming as we move forward in a progressive manner. Whether
you are a newcomer to Haralson County or a long time
resident I thank you for choosing us to educate your student. We are here to serve you and ensure your

child is given the opportunity to achieve at the highest levels in academics, the arts, and athletics. Students attending Haralson County Schools receive the quality education needed to achieve in life after
school. I encourage you to get involved in your child’s education and work alongside your school to
Anytime you have suggestions that will help us to become a better educational institution I encourage
you to call, email, or visit your local school or the district office so we may consider your ideas. I believe
in open communication between stakeholders and will always make the necessary time to communicate
with you. “All of us are better than any one of us” and I truly believe it will take “all of us” to provide the
education necessary for a successful future.
Thank you for allowing me to serve as your superintendent of schools. It is a GREAT DAY TO BE A REBEL
and I am excited about the future of our school district, our students, and our community.
